sentence: In trading on Tuesday, the iShares U.S. Home Construction ETF ( ITB ) is outperforming other ETFs, up about 1.9% on the day.
Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of Home Depot ( HD ), up about 5.1% and shares of Louisiana Pacific ( LPX ), up about 3.6% on the day.
And underperforming other ETFs today is the Junior Gold Miners ETF ( GDXJ ), down about 1% in Tuesday afternoon trading.

Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Tuesday were shares of Rubicon Minerals (RMX.CA), lower by about 4%, and shares of Silver Standard Resources ( SSRI ), lower by about 3.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
